section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Col - represents a column. either existing column in the db (the constant columns GameID, SavedGame ...) or created columns.

section.title: as()[1/2]
section.para: As own name. practically keeps the name's case.

section.title: as()[2/2]
section.para: creates a new column with the given alias as its alias

section.title: countIf()
section.para: Count if col. only counts if the given condition is true

para.computeroutput: Col ver14.SharedClasses.DBActions.Table.Col.math (Math operation, Object value, boolean changeSelf)

section.title: of()[1/2]
section.para: new col like this that belongs to the given owner

section.title: of()[2/2]
section.para: new col like this that belongs to the given table
